fullplot: An engaged couple's backpacking trip in the Caucasus Mountains is derailed by a single misstep that threatens to undo everything the pair believed about each other and about themselves.
plot: An engaged couple's backpacking trip in the Caucasus Mountains is derailed by a single misstep that threatens to undo everything the pair believed about each other and about themselves.
title: The Loneliest Planet

tomatoes.consensus: The source material that inspired The Loneliest Planet may be brief, but this adaptation of a Tom Bissell short story compensates with studious, finely detailed filmmaking, haunting visuals, and thought-provoking subtext.

writers: Tom Bissell (short story 'Expensive Trips Nowhere" from the collection "God Lives In St. Petersburg')
Mikhail Lermontov (excerpt from 'A Hero Of Our Time')
